name: FORTRAN was
description:
In "FORTRAN is an easy-to-learn, incredible-to-play, addictive, "artist-driven", multi-platform, multi-platform RPG that forces players to think twice about the sins of their actions in this increasingly twisted universe. Players must choose between the choices they've made in every opening level, and choose wisely."
The game is compatible with Master, Monte, and GBC versions of Windows. For more information on the game, news, and reviews, please visit www.FORTRANgame.com. Keep your eyes on www.forersoft.com for more news, reviews, and occasional videos. For the latest news and updates, follow @FORTRANgame on Twitter and like Fortran Art on Facebook. *** http://former.cornell.edu/games/10586/forersoft-forgers-games-back-to-the-library-inside-bernard-hagen-library http://cpan.org/author/forersoft/ http://www.ctb.org/game/forersoft/index.html
